title: Art and Craft (2014)

cast.name: Jill Chancey
cast.character: Herself, curator, Lauren Rogers Museum of Art

cast.name: Aaron Cowan
cast.character: Himself, history professor, University of Cincinnati

cast.name: Robert K. Wittman
cast.character: Himself, special agent, Art Crime Team, Federal Bureau of Investigation

cast.name: Donna English
cast.character: Herself, Mark A. Landis' former caseworker

cast.name: John Gasper
cast.character: Himself, associate editor and chief business commentator, Financial Times

overview: For several decades, gifted and incredibly prolific forger Mark Landis compulsively created impeccable copies of works by a variety of major artists, donating them to institutions across the country and landing pieces on many of their walls. Art and Craft brings us into the cluttered and insular life of an unforgettable character just as he finds his foil in an equally obsessive art registrar.
storyline: When one of the most prolific art forgers in US history is finally exposed, he must confront the legacy of his 30-year con.
